listing.listing_description: This spectacular villa enjoys a lofty coastal perch within walking distance of Kata Noi Beach on the southwest shore of Phuket, with panoramic views of the Andaman Sea. Designed by Naga Concept Architects in a superb Southeast Asian style, the villa gracefully fuses interior and outdoor living areas and features resort-style, family-friendly amenities including a large swimming pool, high-end entertainment room, and games room. A three-bedroom main house and detached master suite offer spacious and comfortable accommodations for ten guests.An exquisitely tiled infinite swimming pool forms the heart of the villa, its gem-toned surface meshing with the lush coastline and vast expanse of sea. The pool forms an L-shape around the dining pavilion, offering ample room to relax in the soothing water while gazing upon the horizon. A lovely table for eight is perched amid plentiful doors to the pool and sea-kissed breeze—a cool venue for alfresco meals. Extraordinary Buddhist artwork and detail inspire serene enjoyment of the present moment while rooting you in the rich history of coastal Thailand.At the far end of the pool, an ample salon with retractable glass walls invites you to sip refreshments in the ocean air. Breathtaking antique doors lead into a second dining room with sublime vistas. The gourmet kitchen features high-grade appliances and generous prep areas for you or your private chef.All four bedroom suites offer beautifully furnished havens for downtime and rest. The main house includes three bedrooms, each with a double bed, lounge, ocean-view balcony, and ensuite bathroom with rain shower and tub. The separate master suite opens directly to the pool terrace and features a lounge and ensuite bathroom with jetted tub, rain shower, and alfresco shower.The villa is about 150 paces to Kata Noi Beach, renowned as one of the finest on the island. Less crowded than nearby Kata Beach, Kata Noi's calm waters make it a favorite among families with children. The villa is also within walking distance of tennis courts, a gym, and many shops and fine restaurants, including the Boathouse Wine & Grill. A host of activities and iconic attractions are within ten to twenty minutes by car, including the Big Buddha Temple, Red Mountain Golf Club, and Phuket town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This architectural jewel enjoys an extraordinary beachfront position on the east coast of Koh Samui, in the area of Lamai. The villa strikes an ideal balance between privacy and resort-like amenities, including a private beach, ample swimming pool, extraordinary private staff, and outstanding entertainment equipment. With multiple pavilions perched along the beach's white sands, the villa features five bedroom suites including a stunning master suite and a children’s room, making it a superb choice for family vacations on one of Southeast Asia's most enchanting shores.The multi-tiered villa and terrace meld harmoniously with the lush hillside, the infinity pool mirroring a vast panorama of the Gulf of Thailand. Lounge chairs on the lovely wooden deck invite you to bask in the South Pacific sun, while shaded sitting areas offer a cool venue for sipping homemade refreshments. A lovely staircase leads down to the beach, where guests can venture out on the villa's kayak and paddleboard, or simply plunge into the luminous sea. Beachside hammocks welcome dreamy afternoons in the ocean breeze.The main pavilion features a cavernous living room with high, vaulted ceilings and ocean views. Folding glass walls open to the terrace, inhaling the breeze into the home, while air conditioning keeps the interiors cool when needed. The gorgeous timber dining table shares an ample space with the gourmet kitchen, which includes a fine bar and high-grade appliance for your private Thai chef. Gorgeous natural wood surfaces, superb traditional artwork, and seashell-shaped chandeliers cast a serene ambiance throughout the luminous home.Each of the five bedroom suites (including the children's room) features a king bed, high-end entertainment system, and well-appointed ensuite bathroom with tub and shower. Beautiful exposed wood and stone resonate with the natural beauty of this timeless island paradise, imburing your downtime hours with tranquility.Beyond the private world of Baan Hinta, you'll find plentiful activities and destinations nearby for guests of all ages, including world-class watersports, renowned traditional temples, majestic waterfalls, Lamai Market, and the kid-friendly Coco Splash Adventure & Waterpark. Beach lovers will want to visit the placid and beautiful Chaweng Noi, one of the island's finest.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: If you’ve been looking for the beachfront escape of your dreams, simply make the 25 minute drive from the Phuket airport to Coastal Escape. This incredible luxury vacation rental offers an unparalleled location on Natai Beach, stylish and spacious living areas, and impeccable service and amenities. Book the five bedrooms for the ultimate family holiday or a tropical getaway with friends.The villa’s private oceanfront living areas, from sitting and dining areas to an infinity pool and outdoor bar, make it easy to take in the panoramic Andaman Sea views.The clean exterior lines and sliding glass walls lead to gorgeously designed, mod-inspired interiors. An L-shaped great room frames the pool terrace, offering ocean views from the living room, dining room and kitchen. The separate lounge area has the same flair—think plush area rugs, tufted seating and neutral tones peppered with colorful accents—but is a more intimate space for watching TV or using the Wi-Fi.This villa has four bedrooms with king beds, lounge areas, and access to a terrace or balcony: three with ocean views and one with garden views. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and garden views. All five bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms — and the same contemporary take on mid-century style as the great room.Spend your stay indulging in wellness and massage treatments in the villa’s own massage room or reliving your honeymoon with a hand-in-hand stroll along Natai Beach. If you’d like to see more of the area, drive into central Phuket or the nearby Sirinat National Park, ask staff to assist in reserving a tee time at the nearest golf course, or visit one of the three other beaches within day-trip distance.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located among the lush jungle hills of Choeng Thale, this private villa offers seven en-suite king bedrooms, four swimming pools, incredible hillside views, and proximity to some of Phuket’s most celebrated attractions. Villa Jantra accommodates fourteen guests, and three of the bedrooms, located across the bridge, feature private entrances and their own private plunge pools. Within twenty kilometers, you’ll have access to shopping, golf, spa services, and plenty of Thailand’s beautiful beachfront areas.Clean, modern architecture provides an exciting contrast to the lush foliage of Jantra’s jungle surroundings. Once inside, you’ll appreciate Jantra’s contemporary style. Sleek lines, designer furniture, and high-end electronics decorate the shared spaces. Wood and stone accent walls remind guests of the beauty outside. An open-air approach to Jantra’s floor plan ensures that indoor and outdoor spaces merge seamlessly, in a way that delightfully blurs the line between inside and out. In the kitchen, your inner chef will be inspired by state of the art appliances, functional working areas, and the bright, social environment. And at dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside or the alfresco set on the terrace.Outside, amongst the distant ocean views and lush jungle, you’re sure to be impressed with Jantra’s high level of privacy. There are plenty of great spots to work on your tan, as well as lots of shaded and covered areas to relax in a lounge chair. Jantra’s terrace also features a well-equipped outdoor kitchenette, furnished living area, and a refreshing infinity swimming pool.The nearest beach to Villa Jantra is Layan, which is just a little over three-kilometers from home. Layan Beach is a favorite among locals and has somehow managed to elude the radar of most vacationers despite its crystal clear waters and beautiful white sand. Layan also features a beachfront restaurant, and Dream Beach Club is just a short walk along the coast. If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Club is a favorite course among return visitors because of its challenging fairways and scenic views.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hold your next large-scale event on the beachfront at this multi-villa estate in Koh Samui. Embrace the help of a full-staff during your destination wedding, corporate retreat, or family reunion. Mingle with friends at the poolside wet bar while the kids run around the playground. Then, drive 8-kilometers to Nathon for some souvenir shopping and a seafood dinner.Split into 3 separate villas; the Chai Talay Estate offers accommodations for 28 guests. There’s formal and alfresco dining for even more. And, each villa has its own set of full amenities. The tropical setting is put on display thanks to the open-air layout. Follow the pathways that connect each area, and you’ll surely find the perfect place to read in the shade, work on your tan, or dig your feet into the sand. The estate comes with a vast selection of sporting facilities, watersport equipment, and 2 swimming pools. After a long day, settle in for a movie night in front of the outdoor cinema screen or book yourself a massage.Hop on one of the provided bicycles and keep up with your fitness schedule while you explore the estate. If you’d rather travel by sea, there’s a kayak waiting for you on the beach. For a different beach setting, check out the club at Nikki Beach, it’s an excellent spot for dinner and cocktails at sunset. If you’re interested in the local culture, visit the Big Buddha Temple and Old Fisherman’s Village, both are less than a half-hour from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to one of Phuket’s best—but lesser known—white-sand beaches at Villa Baan Amandeha. This exclusive beachfront vacation rental is right on the shores of picturesque Ao Yon Bay, and offers easy access to the activities on the island’s quieter south coast as well as the bustle of Phuket town. Reserve its sleek contemporary interiors and ten bedrooms to host a family reunion, celebrate a special occasion with friends or even to exchange vows in a destination wedding.The villa is tucked into beautiful private gardens featuring palm trees, flowering tropical plants and a 200-year-old tamarind tree. Enjoy the sunshine, sea breezes and beach views from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, barbecue, wet bar, plenty of loungers and a honeymoon-style two-person hot tub. When you’re inside, you can enjoy the home theater system, spa and steam rooms, and ping-pong and pool tables.One of Thailand’s top architects laid out this luxury property as two buildings connected by a sky bridge, taking full advantage of the light and location. The main living area has an open-plan living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen spread out over more than 2,000 square feet of space, all with clean-lined modern furniture.The villa has nine bedrooms with two twin beds each, which can be arranged as one king bed, and one bedroom with two king beds. All ten bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and can accommodate up to twenty guests on holiday together. Many of the suites also have sea views or open to a furnished balcony.Not only is Ao Yon Beach a postcard-perfect crescent of sand and brilliant blue water, it’s one of the few beaches on Phuket to offer swimming nearly every day of the year. If you’d like to compare it to others, it’s a short drive to some of the island’s most popular beaches, such as Patong and Surin. For shopping and dining, make the quick trip into Phuket town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Host a once-in-a-lifetime family reunion or unforgettable destination wedding in Thailand at the spectacular Miskawaan Estate. With eight beautiful villas, accommodations for up to seventy-two guests, a full staff, a range of amenities and a location just steps from low-key Maenam Beach, this oceanfront Koh Samui vacation rental is like a luxury resort that you can have to yourselves.Your holiday at the estate includes the services of a private chef, butler, housekeeper, concierge and villa manager, as well as an airport transfer, full breakfast and one in-villa massage per adult guest. The estate features several saltwater pools, stretching along 200 meters of beach, outdoor living and dining areas, snorkeling equipment and beach umbrellas. There’s also a games room, fitness room, media room, satellite television and complimentary Wi-Fi.The eight villas at Miskawaan Estate are an expert pairing of traditional Thai architecture and sleek contemporary style. Open-concept living and dining areas with high ceilings have a breezy feel, and plenty of sliding glass doors let you move seamlessly from indoors to out. Though the villas do have kitchens, the chef will be happy to prepare your selection from the in-villa menu.The estate has five villas with five bedrooms each, one four-bedroom villa and two three-bedroom villas, for a total of thirty-five bedrooms. All of the bedrooms are air conditioned, and all but two have en-suite bathrooms. The choice of accommodations ranges from double beds to twin beds, depending on the room.Spend your days reliving your honeymoon with strolls on the sand, napping on the beach or snorkeling just off shore. The estate is only steps from sandy, relaxed Maenam Beach, a backpacker favorite that’s now popular with couples and families for its casual feel and picture-perfect views. Find tennis and golf, along with exercise facilities, 5 minutes away at Santiburi.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: If you’ve been looking for the beachfront escape of your dreams, simply make the 25 minute drive from the Phuket airport to Coastal Escape. This incredible luxury vacation rental offers an unparalleled location on Natai Beach, stylish and spacious living areas, and impeccable service and amenities. Book the five bedrooms for the ultimate family holiday or a tropical getaway with friends.The villa’s private oceanfront living areas, from sitting and dining areas to an infinity pool and outdoor bar, make it easy to take in the panoramic Andaman Sea views.The clean exterior lines and sliding glass walls lead to gorgeously designed, mod-inspired interiors. An L-shaped great room frames the pool terrace, offering ocean views from the living room, dining room and kitchen. The separate lounge area has the same flair—think plush area rugs, tufted seating and neutral tones peppered with colorful accents—but is a more intimate space for watching TV or using the Wi-Fi.This villa has four bedrooms with king beds, lounge areas, and access to a terrace or balcony: three with ocean views and one with garden views. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and garden views. All five bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms — and the same contemporary take on mid-century style as the great room.Spend your stay indulging in wellness and massage treatments in the villa’s own massage room or reliving your honeymoon with a hand-in-hand stroll along Natai Beach. If you’d like to see more of the area, drive into central Phuket or the nearby Sirinat National Park, ask staff to assist in reserving a tee time at the nearest golf course, or visit one of the three other beaches within day-trip distance.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located within the Sri Panwa Resort, on a private peninsula, Villa Baan Chirawan is an ideal host for a large group getaway. With seven luxurious bedrooms and spacious indoor/outdoor hosting areas that capture ocean views on both sides of the peninsula, you’ll be able to enjoy the sunrise and sunset. Nearby, you’ll have quick and easy access to the many attractions of downtown Phuket, golf, and plenty of gorgeous beachfront.Villa Baan Chirawan’s open concept living room has more than enough space, and seating, for your whole group to gather as one. For more intimate moments, you’ll find several smaller sitting areas, both inside and out. The soothing cream tones of the interior are sure to promote a relaxing atmosphere, especially when the terrace doors are open and the fresh sea breeze is cooling the villa.From Baan Chirawan’s scenic terrace, you’ll enjoy an endless view of the Andaman Sea, as well as some of Phuket’s neighboring islands. With an infinity pool, a hot tub, alfresco dining, and an outdoor kitchen, there’s no need to go inside at all. Actually, there are plenty. Baan Chirawan’s interior is full of interesting art. Floor-to-ceiling glass frames amazing ocean views, and when the doors are open, the inside and out become one incredible hosting area. And, all seven bedrooms are king en-suites. During your stay, you’ll have the help of a housekeeper, security guard, airport transfer service, and you’ll have access to the resort priveledges at Sri Panwa.The nearest beach to Baan Chirawan is Ao Yon, at just three kilometers. If you’re traveling with kids, or the young at heart, Phuket’s aquarium and zoo are both great afternoon excursions. If you’d like to immerse yourself in the local culture and history, plan a trip to Chalong Temple. And, for shopping, dining, and nightlife, it’s only eleven kilometers to Phuket Town’s downtown core. If there’s a golf aficionado in the group, they may want to consider booking a round at Blue Canyon Golf Club, about forty minutes north. The Canyon Course has been host to some of the PGA’s most memorable moments, with nail-biting playoff wins by Tiger Woods and Greg Norman.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located just a 2 minute walk from Kamala Beach, this villa offered the best of modern comforts while being infused with a distinct sense of Thai heritage and craftsmanship. With a gorgeous pool, easy access to the delights of Kamala town, and countless activities nearby, guests can plan their day in shade and comfort while watching surfers on the blue Andaman waves that sweep into the bay below. A rense of regal style runs through this property, with nods to the grandiose, royal history of Thailand being visible throughout. Guests will love starting the day under the ornate, “temple-style” gazebo that sits in the flower-filled garden. Constructed out of polished stone and stained wood, it comes complete with a beautiful round table for socializing and enjoying alfresco meals. For pure refreshment, dive into the pool stretches the length of the villa, reflecting the brilliant Phuket sky above. The spacious interior makes great use of fine wood craftsmanship, with beautiful fixtures and welcoming furniture flanked by stone statues and obsidian carvings from the Thai tradition. Guests will find everything has a little extra in this villa, from the huge spaces of the master bedroom, to the fully-equipped games room, to the bay view offered from the couple’s hot tub.As guests take in the wild hillsides that rise above Surin Hill on the other side of the bay, they can contemplate outings that range from an engaging few hours, to a whole day of adventure. Take to the sea for an unparalleled scuba diving cruise to the coral reefs just beyond Kamala beach, or head into the town itself to sample street food and the town’s famed theme park. Alternatively, head into the island’s interior, to visit hidden waterfalls, the touching encounters that can be had in nearby elephant, tiger and gibbon sanctuaries, as well as the experience-for-the-senses that is the bustling city of Phuket itself. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Skyfall is an exquisite luxury villa on the island of Koh Samui in Thailand. Located in Plai Laem, the hillside home is just minutes from Choeng Mon Beach and enjoys spectacular views of the Gulf of Thailand and Koh Phangnan Island. Superb staff and services include a chef, manager, and 24-hour security. Extraordinary living and dining spaces, including eight superb bedroom suites accommodating sixteen, create the perfect setting for unforgettable family reunions or gatherings of friends in one of the most enchanting destinations in Southeast Asia.The four-level villa features multiple terraces and balconies with outstanding ocean views. The beautiful infinite swimming pool includes a bar and a tanning shelf where you can luxuriate on elegant loungers in the South Pacific sun. Relish alfresco meals prepared by your private chef and linger outside at sunset and at night, sipping delicious cocktails under the sublime sky.Gorgeous glass doors open on both levels of the villa, inviting ocean air and light into the home. The spacious living room gazes out on the pool and sea. Step down into a sumptuous cocktail lounge, likewise with lovely views, and gather in the extraordinary dining room with its table for twelve. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar. At night, gather in the superb lounge with full bar, stylish seating, and a pool table, or watch your favorite movies in the excellent home theater.Each of the bedroom suites is like luxury apartment unto itself, with ensuite bathroom and outstanding furnishings and amenities. All but three of the suites open directly to the terrace or balcony, and each includes a lounge area, desk, and safe. The spectacular master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ocean views.Villa Skyfall provides a fabulous balance of sumptuous privacy and outstanding access to the many splendors of Koh Samui. You're just three minutes to Choeng Mon Beach and seven to Naturism Beach, while world-class golf is an easy drive away at Santiburi and Royal Samui. The famous Wat Plai Laem is just four kilometers down the road. The airport is also just five kilometers away, making Villa Skyfall a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Anayara Beach Villa is located on the sandy shores of Ao Yon Beach in Phuket. With five luxurious king-sized ocean-view bedrooms, you won't have anyone fighting over "the good room." In fact, Anayara's designers made sure that every room in the villa has an incredible ocean view. And, with instant beachfront access, you'll have the freedom to enjoy the ocean on your schedule, no planning, no travel, no hassle.Traditional Thai architecture gets a stylish modern update in this breezy beach house. From head to toe, Anayara is an authentic representation of Thailand's beautiful natural features. Rich wood trim and flooring combine with calming white interiors and sleek designer furniture to create an ambiance that is both soothing and elegant. Every room on the open-concept main floor has access to the terrace, as do the two main floor bedrooms. Upstairs, the three other bedrooms have private balconies, opening Anayara's entire interior space to Phuket's gorgeous climate.Anayara's beachfront terrace practically doubles as a second villa with its outdoor kitchen and grill, furnished lounge areas, and alfresco dining. There are also some great lounge chairs and sun beds positioned around the pool, perfect for working on your vacation tan. Back inside, you'll have everything you need at mealtime, including a chef. There's formal dining for ten, a gorgeous lounge area, a spa, and air conditioning for you and your guests to enjoy. And, there's television and Wi-Fi to help you stay connected, if you want to.There is lots to do nearby Anayara's beachfront estate, and it's all within fifteen-kilometers. Start with a trip to Phuket's downtown where you'll find shopping, dining, and vibrant nightlife. To learn a little about the native wildlife and culture, spend an afternoon at the Phuket Aquarium, Phuket Zoo, and visit Wat Chalong Temple to see the true beauty of ancient Thai architecture. And, a variety of activities, excursions, babysitting, cooking classes, and spa services can be arranged through Anayara's villa manager.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Capture the incredible sunrise at this hillside villa nestled between the ocean and the jungle on Koh Samui’s pristine east coast. Six ocean-view bedrooms look out from Punjabi Hill, giving every guest a fantastic vantage point. Slide open the balcony doors at dinner and invite the sea breeze to the party. Then, head out for drinks in Chaweng, the island’s bustling nightlife capital.Sunny Moon Villa can’t help but promote nautical vibes. And why not? Subtle splashes of ocean-inspired turquoise can be found throughout, celebrating the gorgeous Gulf of Thailand. Acting like a canvas, pristine white walls convey a relaxing tone while providing a neutral background for a vibrant art collection. Warm wood tones and slate add a natural element to the interior, without distracting from the truly incomparable environment of Thailand. And, you’ll find plenty of time to soak up the sun beside the pool while the full-staff takes care of every detail.Koh Samui has a neighborhood to match your vibe on any night, so get out and do some bar hopping. If you feel like dancing, downtown Chaweng is the spot. Rather sip tropical cocktails on a moonlit beach? Lamai has the beach club for you. If you’re in the mood for some authentic Thai cuisine in a historical setting, travel 9-km to Fisherman’s Village. In the afternoon, snap a few pictures at Big Buddha Temple after a guided hike through the jungle.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Architecturally stunning, the Chaweng Peak Villas are a pair of four bedroom luxury rentals located on the same lush plot of land along Chaweng Noi’s scenic hillside. With the combined amenities of Villa Moon Shadow and Karpe Diem, Chaweng Peak can accommodate up to sixteen guests, making this the perfect setting for a special group event. Easily one of Koh Samui’s most prestigious homes, Chaweng Peak includes three swimming pools, panoramic ocean views, and an open-air environment that is sure to sooth the soul.Drawing inspiration from its natural surroundings, Chaweng Peak’s architects used eco-friendly design and state of the art technical features to create a modern luxury villa that seamlessly integrates into Thailand’s beautiful environment. Decorated with intriguing works of art, designer furniture, and wide openings to the balcony, it’s obvious that every inch of this villa was thoughtfully crafted. Spacious dining areas and lounges make it easy to host group gatherings, while smaller settings like the pool’s swim-up bar, games room, and hot tub are great for more intimate affairs.During your stay, you’ll benefit from the help of a villa manager, housekeeper, in-house staff, and private chef. Each villa is fully air-conditioned and comes with Wi-Fi, satellite television, and sound systems. The Karpe Diem villa also has an exercise room and spa. And, most of the eight bedrooms have ensuites, outdoor areas, and ocean views.WIthin ten kilometers of home, you’ll find the sandy shores of Chaweng, Lamai, and Bophut beaches. Four minutes away, one of Thailand’s best golf courses awaits at the Royal Samui Golf and Country Club. For some local history, Big Buddha Temple is a must-see. And, for delicious cuisine and exciting nightlife, the Nathon Night market is the place to be.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Nirvana is a magnificent luxury home on Cape Panwa in southwest Phuket, with direct access to Panwa Beach. Protected by private roads, this beach is one of the island's most serene and enchanting, with bay-sheltered waters open year-round for swimmers (unlike many of the beaches on Phuket's west coast). The villa is part of a small enclave of high-end residences with a shared, beachfront swimming pool. Perched on elevated ground, the two-story home enjoys breathtaking, panoramic views of the Andaman Sea. Generous outdoor spaces (including a six-person hot tub) and superbly appointed interiors create an ideal haven for families and groups of friends up to eight in size.The villa's ample upper balcony inspires long days and evenings in the sea-kissed air. Bask in the sunlight on elegant lounge chairs before descending to the pool or sea. Return to alfresco meals at the table for eight, and sunset cocktails in the comfortable lounge. Crawl into the hot tub for a soothing soak in the dreamy nighttime breeze.Wide glass doors fuse the balcony with the open-concept interior, creating an expansive, indoor/outdoor venue. The luminous interior features a classy bar, a cozy TV lounge, and a second beautiful dining table. The semi-open kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and easily serves the various living and dining areas. White surfaces and natural wood accents complement the exquisite art collection, blending contemporary and traditional Thai influences.The villa features three king bedrooms and one kid-friendly room with twin-size Murphy beds. Each room has safe and 3D TV. The master suite includes a lovely piano, wine fridge, and ensuite bathroom with jetted tub. The primary guest suite also enjoys a wine fridge and ensuite bathroom. The other two rooms share a Balinese-style bathroom with alfresco shower. The villa is fully air-conditioned and includes plentiful ceiling fans.Panwa Beach offers a peaceful alternative to Phuket's more popular tourist destinations, with minimal visitors, perfect swimming conditions, and a wonderful selection of restaurants, wellness centers, and watersport offerings in the vicinity. The villa is also within walking distance of Ao Yon Beach, and less than a kilometer from Tarzan Adventure Phuket. Phuket Town is just nine kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched on the hillside of Thalang, Villa Dara enjoys views of the lush jungle, stretching all the way to the Andaman Sea. With seven luxurious bedrooms, spacious interiors, and a vast terrace, Dara is the perfect host for a family vacation, golf trip with friends, or a refreshing retreat. Nearby, you’ll find one of Phuket’s best-kept secrets, Layan Beach. A favorite among locals, Layan has managed to stay fairly inconspicuous on the tourist scene, despite its beautiful white sand, calm and clear waters, and a beachfront restaurant.The ability to fully enjoy the incredible scenery and natural elements of Phuket was of utmost importance to Dara’s architect, as you will see when exploring the open-air estate. Fresh breeze and natural sunlight have every opportunity to fill the open concept common areas thanks to the many wide openings to the terrace. Inside, sleek and stylish modern design shows off Dara’s luxurious side. Designer furniture, high-end electronics, and contemporary works of art provide the decor. In the kitchen, state of the art appliances will inspire your inner chef. And, there’s a barbecue on the terrace as well.Outside, Dara’s swimming pool is the perfect place to relax while you enjoy a sunny afternoon. After a dip, work on your tan from one of the sun loungers or sunbeds placed throughout the spacious terrace. At dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside or the alfresco set on the terrace. And after, enjoy a night under the stars, sipping your favorite cocktail with friends and loved ones on the terrace’s furnished lounge area.When it’s time to get out and explore Phuket, a great place to start is Bangla Road in Patong Beach. Just under half an hour from home, Bangla Road is Phuket’s nightlife capital. There, you’ll find a wide range of bars, restaurants, and nightclubs. If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Course and Blue Canyon Country Club are within a short drive. And, for shopping and dining a little closer to home, Boat Avenue Mall will have everything you need.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perfect for vacationers who appreciate privacy, this sleek and stylish four bedroom is close enough to the action, yet tucked away amongst lush tropical greenery and mature palm trees. Located in the Thalang District of Phuket, Villa 61 puts you within a short drive of some of the island’s most coveted attractions. You’ll find World-class golf, Thailand’s largest water park, Thalang Museum, and numerous historical sites surrounding Villa 61’s beautiful property. And, Villa 61 comes with a complimentary shuttle service to one of Phuket’s best beachfront destinations, Dream Beach Club on Layan Beach.Villa 61’s classic black and white palette is the perfect contrast to the vibrant colors of Thailand’s gorgeous environment. Inside, you’ll appreciate the social atmosphere created by the villa’s open concept layout and wide openings to the terrace. State of the art electronics and appliances can be found throughout, as well as modern contemporary furniture, and eclectic works of art.Start your day with complimentary breakfast at The Plantation Restaurant. Later, enjoy afternoon tea service, before you shuttle over to beautiful Layan Beach. For dinner, Villa 61’s fully equipped kitchen, barbecue, formal dining area, and alfresco set on the terrace will provide multiple options and inspiration. Also on the terrace, you’ll love cooling off in the infinity pool, lounging in sun chairs, and relaxing under the shade of the gazebo on the lawn.Although it’s one of Phuket’s most popular beaches, Layan manages to keep a fairly low-profile in certain parts of its sandy stretch. On one end, Dream Beach Club is the place to be if you’re looking for fun in the sun, or after dark. If you’d prefer somewhere quiet and less populated to relax under a palm tree or work on your tan, the northern end of Layan is where you should lay your beach towel. If there’s a golfer in the group, the southern parts of Phuket are rich with amazing courses, like Blue Canyon, Laguna, and Loch Palm golf clubs, to name a few.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located just off the southern edge of Kamala Beach, this luxurious open-air villa has an unbeatable ocean view from all five bedrooms, and it’s living areas. Nearby, you’ll have quick access to the beach, shopping, amusement parks, nightlife, golf, and restaurants. Although there’s plenty of amazing cuisine in the area, you might find it hard to tear yourself away from Andara’s beautiful estate, complete with a private Thai chef. With spacious common areas, five ocean-view king en-suite bedrooms, and plenty to keep you busy within a short drive, Andara is perfect for a family vacation, golf trip with friends, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style.Andara's modern exterior embraces Thailand’s lush tropical greenery by displaying its mature palm trees, bright flowers, and wild vines that hang from the balcony over the ocean-view terrace. The open concept living room’s perimeter is made up of floor-to-ceiling glass, framing garden and ocean view from all angles. Open the wide doors to the terrace, and the interior floods with fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight.From its ocean-view balcony, infinity pool, and lavish interior you’ll enjoy an ever-present vista of the Andaman Sea during your stay at Andara. At dinner, there’s alfresco dining under the pavilion on the terrace and a formal dining area inside. Other interior features include Wi-Fi, satellite television, air conditioning, exercise equipment, and a pool table.After you’ve explored the sandy shores and calm waters of Kamala Beach, the numerous inland golf courses, and the seaside district of Kathu, head into Phuket town for an exciting and eclectic mix of attractions. For nightlife, shopping, and dinner, Old Town is the place to be, especially on Sundays when Thalang Road is closed to traffic and turns into an open-air market. If you’re in the mood for something a little off the wall, visit Phuket’s Upside Down House or the Trickeye Museum, both are extremely artistic and interesting for the whole family.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take yourself away to the quieter side of Koh Samui at the stunning Villa Kasalong. Nestled into a lush hillside in the Taling Ngam area, this stylish vacation rental commands some of the best views on the island: verdant treetops, turquoise waters and distant hills. It’s a gorgeous setting for a family reunion, a tropical holiday with friends or even an intimate destination wedding.Your stay at Villa Kasalong includes daily breakfast, housekeeping service and the use of a seven-passenger SUV. Soak in the sun from a broad terrace with an infinity pool and plenty of loungers, or unwind in the shaded al-fresco living and dining areas. In the evenings, a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi are waiting to entertain.Open-concept living areas with fold-back glass walls let you enjoy the 180-degree views of Koh Samui even while you’re indoors. The tiled floors are carried over from the terrace for a seamless indoor-outdoor feel, and an eclectic mix of vintage and modern pieces lends a relaxed appeal to the living and dining areas. A separate kitchen is fully equipped and has a long breakfast bar as well.This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, and four bedrooms with queen beds. All six bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have ocean views. As in the great room, you’ll find an expert pairing of sleek modern pieces and traditional kilim rugs in the bedrooms.The provided SUV makes it easy to explore the island, whether you’re admiring Laem Sor Pagoda, 6 minutes away by car, or driving to the pier, 10 minutes away, to wander nearby shops and restaurants. There are three beaches within a 20-minute drive of Villa Kasalong, where you can join honeymooners and families alike in the warm waters.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Deny yourself nothing with a stay at Malliouhana - An Auberge Resort. Long a favorite of the Caribbean jet set, the resort was recently renovated, offering retro-chic interiors in a rainbow of pastel hues and floral prints. Luckily, some things haven’t changed, from its gorgeous location on the beaches of Meads Bay and Turtle Cove to its oversized rooms and tradition of pampering service.Start each day at Malliouhana with a continental breakfast or coffee, then head to a yoga class on the pool terrace, the beach for sailing or snorkeling, or the tennis and basketball courts. Explore the property’s beautifully landscaped gardens via bicycle, or simply lounge on the patio—you don’t have any obligations until the resort’s afternoon tea.Though the resort’s Moorish-inspired exteriors haven’t changed, the interiors are a gorgeous mix of retro style and British Colonial influences. Walls painted in shades of mint and buttercream are a delicious backdrop to candy-striped rugs, bold floral- or paisley-print upholstery and whimsical white resin furnishings that mimic the shapes of palms and bamboo. Of course, in addition to their chic side, the guestrooms have practical features like espresso machines, kettles, mini-bars and Wi-Fi.The guestrooms at Malliouhana have two bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom and television. Suites are available with one king bed and one queen bed or two king beds. Wide French doors lead from the bedrooms to balconies stocked with Adirondack chairs, tables and spa-style loungers, so you can watch the waves or step outside and feel the warm ocean breeze.As you’d expect from a luxury resort, it’s just a few minutes’ walk from your room to the beaches at Turtle Cove, Meads Bay and Bobbing Cove. Ask the staff to arrange a tee time at Cuisinart Golf Course, a quick 3.2 km drive from the resort. There are two airports close to Malliouhana; the Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport is on Anguilla, 15 minutes away by car. You can also make the 10-minute drive to the Blowing Point ferry terminal, followed by a 25-minute ferry ride to St. Maarten and a 2-minute drive to Princess Juliana International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take yourself away to one of the most exclusive areas of Phuket at Villa Baan Amandhara. Set on Cape Panwa, the gateway to islands such as Phi Phi and Koh Racha, this beachfront vacation rental also is right on the white sands of Ao Yon Bay. Added to its contemporary living areas and six bedrooms, the location makes this luxury property perfect for a relaxed holiday with family or friends.Enjoy your own private views of the Andaman Sea from a gorgeous waterfront terrace with an infinity pool, plenty of loungers and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue. Inside, the villa features an exercise room, ping-pong and pool tables, plus a TV, DVD player, sound system and Wi-Fi for your entertainment.From its built-in outdoor seating to its glass walls and open-concept layout, this newly built residence is sleek and contemporary. Open the sliding doors to the terrace to connect the al-fresco living areas with the indoor living area, dining table and fully equipped kitchen. Even with the doors closed, the glass walls bring the sea views inside.Each of the villa’s six bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and a furnished outdoor space, whether a terrace or balcony. The suites also have TVs, mini-fridges, air conditioning and ceiling fans, as well as the same clean-lined modern style as the great room.Pretty and sheltered, Ao Yon Beach is one of the few on Phuket to offer nearly year-round swimming—and it’s just in front of Villa Baan Amandhara. If you’d like to compare it to some of the island’s better-known beaches, it’s just a short drive to Patong Beach and Surin Beach. If you’re traveling with kids, try a visit to the nearby Phuket Aquarium or Phuket Zoo. To browse for souvenirs or try out local restaurants, drive into Phuket town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exceptional villa is located within Layan Residences by Anantara, a luxury resort community on the west coast of Phuket Island. Blending traditional Thai style with a contemporary sensibility and high-end comforts, the 2,600-square-meter home features an impressive array of private amenities, including a twenty-one-meter infinity swimming pool, alfresco dining sala, in-villa spa with hot tub, and rooftop deck with panoramic views. Additionally, the villa is a short walk from the beach and within easy reach of the resort’s world-class offerings. A superb private staff will elevate your experience with attentive service and delicious meals. Seven bedroom suites accommodate families, business travelers, and groups of friends up to fourteen in size.The villa’s stunning design harmonizes with the landscape and sea, inviting you to long days and evenings in the open air. Dip into the expansive swimming pool and bask in the sunlight on ample outdoor beds. Dine alfresco in the gorgeous sala with sweeping views, and marvel at the sunset from the lofty roof terrace. At night, linger outdoors amid the enchanting torchlight, savoring wine or cocktails under the canopy of stars.The interior living areas breathe the sea-kissed air through large glass doors. Soft tones, natural wood accents, and beautiful touches of traditional artistry create a serene and inspiring ambiance. Relax in the tranquil living room with ample sectional sofa and large TV, and gather for privately catered meals in the dining room. Cuddle up with a favorite movie in the home cinema, and start your morning with a workout in your private gym.There are two master suites, each with a king bed, walk-in closet, and deluxe bathroom with rain shower and tub. Four of the guest suites feature king beds, while the other has a pair of twin beds—perfect for younger guests. Each suite features an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, and TV, and there are lovely desks in the king rooms.Beyond this secluded haven, the resort features fine restaurants, a fitness center, a kids' club, tennis, and Anantara Spa, as well as a chapel and event spaces for weddings and special ceremonies. Banyan Tree Spa and Laguna Phuket Golf Club are both a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Natha is a chic and contemporary, private hillside villa located close to Koh Samui’s most popular shopping, dining and entertainment enclave along Chaweng Beach. This private vacation rental offers guests breathtaking 180 degree views of the tropical coastline and oceanfront of the crystalline Gulf of Siam. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!The architecture of Villa Natha provides a seamless flow of indoor/outdoor living, with wide terraces for lounging in tranquil comfort and an impressive 50 foot, L-shaped infinity swimming pool. The villa’s comfortable upper lounge is furnished with an inviting oversized double sofa suite, while the airy dining space easily seats ten guests at a long, polished wooden dining table. The dining room also features a breakfast bar and stools, and both areas are directly served by the villa’s fitted western-style kitchen. A second kitchen is primarily use by the chef and staff to prepare more elaborate meals for guests.Inside, you will find a combination of crisp white walls, smooth marble tiled floors and warm wooden tones. The sophisticated interior design blends natural textures and gentle Asian touches. The villa’s capacious open plan design includes living and dining spaces, both of which fold onto the furnished poolside terrace. The dining room extends onto a separate terrace with a built-in barbeque. A second living area and media room is situated on the middle floor of the property, furnished with a long sofa facing a large flat screen television. Sliding doors at one end of the room open to a study.The villa’s five luxurious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms are spread over three floors. All of them offer sensational sea views right from the bed. Televisions and built-in wardrobes add to the feeling of a five-star resort, while the huge en-suite bathrooms in the two master suites provide twin wash basins and both indoor or outdoor showers.Additional facilities for guests at Villa Natha include a fully equipped private gym, as well as a fabulous home cinema with comfortable seating, a large projector screen and surround sound. The property includes 24-hour security service and parking spaces. You will also be within minutes of the boutiques and fine dining in Chaweng and the magnificent holes at the Santiburi Golf Course, a regular stop on the PGA tour. Come with the family on holiday, or host a wedding reception!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Elevate your Phuket holiday at Villa Aye. Perched on a hillside overlooking the sea, with steeples and pavilions reminiscent of a Buddhist temple, this luxury vacation rental is a tranquil sanctuary for up to sixteen friends or family members. Let the attentive staff take care of your needs as you celebrate a milestone birthday or anniversary, host an intimate destination wedding or simply relax.Your stay at Villa Aye includes the services of a chef, property manager and housekeeper, as well as villa security around the clock. Watch the sunrise from one of the east-facing outdoor living areas, then revel in the panoramic views from the loungers on the sunny terrace or the wide infinity pool. Other amenities include a barbecue, al-fresco dining for eight, indoor and outdoor sound systems, fitness and yoga rooms, and entertaining areas with a bar and pool table.Inside the villa, details like vaulted ceilings, an open-concept layout and fold-away glass walls create a breezy ambience and maximize the stunning views. Clean-lined furnishings and a low-profile, Japanese-inspired dining table mean there’s nothing to interrupt the scenery, and a fully equipped kitchen with a coffee machine and wine fridge makes it easy to start and end the day on the right note.Each of the eight bedrooms at Villa Aye is a private retreat with an en-suite bathroom; many have a lounge area and a terrace or balcony as well. There are seven bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite, and one bedroom with two twin beds.A stay at Villa Aye puts you close to some of Phuket’s best beaches and top attractions. The tucked-away cove of Yae Beach is only a 2-minute drive away; go a little farther and you’ll be at the more popular Kamala and Surin beaches. Book a round or a treatment at the nearby Laguna Phuket Golf Club and Banyan Tree Spa, or make the 20-minute drive into town for shopping, dining and nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
